title: Resources
text:
Here are key tools, tutorials, and references I used throughout my internship:

PolarWatch Data Catalog

title: Milestone 2: Data Analysis and Visualization
text: This milestone focused on the analysis and visualization of sea ice concentration data. I explored spatial and temporal trends and developed visualization skills to present the data effectively.

title: Milestone 2: Data Analysis and Visualization
text: This milestone focused on the analysis and visualization of sea ice concentration data. I explored spatial and temporal trends and developed visualization skills to present the data effectively.

title: Milestone 2: Data Analysis and Visualization
text:
Key Objectives

Explore spatial-temporal patterns in sea ice concentration
Develop visualizations to communicate findings effectively
Gain familiarity with satellite data visualization techniques

title: Milestone 2: Data Analysis and Visualization
text:
Tasks and Methods

Calculated weekly means of sea ice concentration for different periods using xarray
Visualized sea ice concentration using Python’s Matplotlib and Cartopy libraries
Explored the seasonal variability of sea ice

title: Milestone 2: Data Analysis and Visualization
text:
Results and Findings

Visualized the changes in sea ice concentration for selected weeks across seasons
Discovered significant trends in sea ice extent reduction in the Arctic

title: Milestone 2: Data Analysis and Visualization
text:
Challenges and Learnings

Handling the large temporal scale of the dataset and optimizing visualizations
Developing clear, informative plot titles and axis labels to improve communication

title: Milestone 2: Data Analysis and Visualization
text:
Next Steps

Proceed to the analysis of sea ice anomalies and trends in Milestone 3

title: Milestone 4: Machine Learning for Sea Ice Prediction
text: This milestone involved building a machine learning model to predict sea ice extent using an LSTM network. The focus was on using sea ice thickness and atmospheric variables as predictors.

title: Milestone 4: Machine Learning for Sea Ice Prediction
text: This milestone involved building a machine learning model to predict sea ice extent using an LSTM network. The focus was on using sea ice thickness and atmospheric variables as predictors.

title: Milestone 4: Machine Learning for Sea Ice Prediction
text:
Key Objectives

Develop an LSTM-based model to predict monthly sea ice extent
Incorporate sea ice thickness data into the model
Evaluate the performance of the model on historical data

title: Milestone 4: Machine Learning for Sea Ice Prediction
text:
Tasks and Methods

Preprocessed the sea ice thickness data and merged it with other predictors
Implemented an LSTM network with an attention mechanism for better feature selection
Evaluated the model’s performance on a holdout dataset

title: Milestone 4: Machine Learning for Sea Ice Prediction
text:
Results and Findings

Successfully developed and trained the LSTM model to predict sea ice extent with a 1-month lead time
The model captured significant trends in sea ice extent, although further tuning is needed for improved accuracy.

title: Milestone 4: Machine Learning for Sea Ice Prediction
text:
Challenges and Learnings

Preprocessing large datasets for machine learning posed challenges in ensuring consistency across variables
Implementing the attention mechanism was particularly useful for focusing on relevant features

title: Milestone 4: Machine Learning for Sea Ice Prediction
text:
Next Steps

Finalize the model and present findings to the team
Deploy the project and publish results on the project website

title: About
text: About this site

title: Milestone 3: Sea Ice Concentration Trends and Anomalies
text: In this milestone, I focused on analyzing sea ice concentration anomalies and trends for 2023 compared to a climatological baseline. This involved statistical analysis and visualization of anomalies.

title: Milestone 3: Sea Ice Concentration Trends and Anomalies
text: In this milestone, I focused on analyzing sea ice concentration anomalies and trends for 2023 compared to a climatological baseline. This involved statistical analysis and visualization of anomalies.

title: Milestone 3: Sea Ice Concentration Trends and Anomalies
text:
Key Objectives

Compare 2023 sea ice concentration with the 2006-2020 climatology
Identify and visualize significant anomalies and trends for 2023
Perform a statistical analysis to detect significant changes

title: Milestone 3: Sea Ice Concentration Trends and Anomalies
text:
Tasks and Methods

Computed weekly climatology from daily data (2006-2020)
Identified weeks with significant anomalies and visualized them using polar projection maps
Conducted the Mann-Kendall test to determine trends

title: Milestone 3: Sea Ice Concentration Trends and Anomalies
text:
Results and Findings

Discovered significant negative anomalies in certain weeks, indicating reduced sea ice extent compared to the climatology
Visualized the largest anomalies in sea ice concentration using Cartopy

title: Milestone 3: Sea Ice Concentration Trends and Anomalies
text:
Challenges and Learnings

Implementing the Mann-Kendall test for trend detection was a new learning experience
Mapping anomalies clearly required fine-tuning of visualization parameters

title: Milestone 3: Sea Ice Concentration Trends and Anomalies
text:
Next Steps

Develop a machine learning model to predict sea ice extent in Milestone 4

title: Milestone 1: Foundations of Satellite Data
text: In this milestone, I focused on learning the foundational tools and methodologies for working with satellite data. I explored key satellite datasets and became proficient in accessing and manipulating this data.

title: Milestone 1: Foundations of Satellite Data
text: In this milestone, I focused on learning the foundational tools and methodologies for working with satellite data. I explored key satellite datasets and became proficient in accessing and manipulating this data.

title: Milestone 1: Foundations of Satellite Data
text:
Key Objectives

Learn to access satellite data through the ERDDAP data server
Develop skills in using Python for data manipulation
Understand the basics of sea ice data and its applications

title: Milestone 1: Foundations of Satellite Data
text:
Tasks and Methods

Accessed and explored the NOAA/NSIDC sea ice concentration dataset
Developed Python scripts using the xarray library to handle and manipulate large datasets
Documented the process in a Jupyter notebook, including tutorials and examples

title: Milestone 1: Foundations of Satellite Data
text:
Results and Findings

Successfully accessed sea ice data
Gained insights into the seasonal variability of sea ice properties from 1978 to present

title: Milestone 1: Foundations of Satellite Data
text:
Challenges and Learnings

It was challenging to process the large datasets efficiently on my local machine.
Learning xarray and ERDDAP was a critical part of this milestone.

title: Milestone 1: Foundations of Satellite Data
text:
Next Steps

Move on to visualizing and analyzing the sea ice concentration data in more detail in Milestone 2
